dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Thirty days. That's the new visa-free stay for tourists in Thailand, down from sixty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thirty days. That's the new visa-free stay for tourists in Thailand, down from sixty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thailand has shortened the visa-free stay for foreigners from 60 to 30 days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's a pretty significant cut, right? It was just, uh, announced by the state department.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's a pretty significant cut, right? It was just, uh, announced by the state department.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This was reported by the kingdom's state department.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's all coming from the top, apparently. Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra ordered the revision.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's all coming from the top, apparently. Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra ordered the revision.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra has recently ordered a revision of the visa-free entry scheme after finding that some visitors have violated the law, such as overstaying and working illegally.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, because they found some visitors were, like, overstaying or working illegally on those tourist entries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, because they found some visitors were, like, overstaying or working illegally on those tourist entries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra has recently ordered a revision of the visa-free entry scheme after finding that some visitors have violated the law, such as overstaying and working illegally.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. So now they're having the Foreign Affairs Ministry and a few others study the whole scheme's impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. So now they're having the Foreign Affairs Ministry and a few others study the whole scheme's impact.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Related agencies, including the Foreign Affairs Ministry, Interior Ministry, and Tourism and Sports Ministry, have been urged to study the scheme's impact, especially the appropriate duration of stays, so that it would meet its objective, which is to promote tourism," the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: To figure out what the appropriate duration should actually be to still promote tourism but curb the abuse.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To figure out what the appropriate duration should actually be to still promote tourism but curb the abuse.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Related agencies, including the Foreign Affairs Ministry, Interior Ministry, and Tourism and Sports Ministry, have been urged to study the scheme's impact, especially the appropriate duration of stays, so that it would meet its objective, which is to promote tourism," the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a tough balance. I mean, citizens from 93 countries currently get that 60-day stamp.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a tough balance. I mean, citizens from ninety three countries currently get that sixty-day stamp.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently, citizens of 93 countries and territories are eligible for visa-free entry for tourism or urgent business trips for up to 60 days, with the possibility of extending the stay for no more than 30 additional days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: With the option to extend for another thirty days, which is... a pretty long time for a visa-free stay, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: With the option to extend for another thirty days, which is... a pretty long time for a visa-free stay, honestly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently, citizens of 93 countries and territories are eligible for visa-free entry for tourism or urgent business trips for up to 60 days, with the possibility of extending the stay for no more than 30 additional days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But starting May 1st, 2025, there's another change too—the paper arrival card is being replaced.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But starting May first, twenty twenty five, there's another change too-the paper arrival card is being replaced.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, it was reported that starting from May 1, 2025, the entry procedure to Thailand will change for all foreign nationals, including citizens of Kazakhstan " instead of the familiar TM.6 paper arrival card, travelers will now need to complete a Thailand Digital Arrival Card (TDAC).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, the TM.6 form is out, and it's all going digital with the Thailand Digital Arrival Card.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, the T M.six form is out, and it's all going digital with the Thailand Digital Arrival Card.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So it's a double whammy for travelers—shorter stays and a new digital procedure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's a double whammy for travelers-shorter stays and a new digital procedure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder how this will affect tourism numbers. Some people plan longer trips, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I wonder how this will affect tourism numbers. Some people plan longer trips, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. A month is still a decent amount of time for a holiday, but it does cut out those long-term nomads.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. A month is still a decent amount of time for a holiday, but it does cut out those long-term nomads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is probably the point, to be honest. They want tourists, not people living there on tourist visas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is probably the point, to be honest. They want tourists, not people living there on tourist visas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that makes sense. It'll be interesting to see what the ministries recommend after their review.
